Objectifs du module: All along the year, conferences and seminars are organized to introduce students to cutting-edge knowledge on sustainable and green finance or to original and innovative contribution of companies on the topic. This cycle aims to complement the skills and knowledge acquire during the courses but also to get in touch with real-life business cases.
Programme du module: The program changes every year. It includes site visits, conference and informal gatherings.
Contr\u00f4le des connaissances - R\u00e: Attendance is mandatory. Students shall send a 7000-caracter (including spaces) note on each conference. The deadline to send the note is 14 days after the conference. The note will highlight a specific issue developed during the conference for an external audience who did not follow the conference. The students validate the module if they have provided a note for every conference.
